title: The application for the proposed Yogalaya or Fitness Centre shall be made by the Registered Co-Operative Housing Society/Apartment Owners Association of the buildings that has been issued the occupation certificate/BCC
clause_text: The application for the proposed Yogalaya or Fitness Centre shall be made by the Registered Co-Operative Housing Society/Apartment Owners Association of the buildings that has been issued the occupation certificate/BCC. The owner/developer may make an application for proposed Yogalaya or Fitness Centre with registered undertaking stating that constructed Yogalaya or Fitness Centre shall be handed over to proposed Co-Operative Housing Society/Apartment Owners Association; and in turn shall ensure the handing over on completion.
